name: Galactic Battles
description: Galactic Battles is a complex 2D top-down space shooter in which you have to fight with alien invaders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 Processor: 1 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
